headline: Associate Legal Advisor, National Security Law Section, US Immigration and Customs Enforcement
summary: Specialties: National Security Law, Immigration Law, International Humanitarian Law, Human Rights Law, Public International Law

defaultPosition.description: Provide guidance on various aspects of immigration law, including national security, claims to U.S. citizenship, the role of human rights law in immigration law, and federal litigation. All with the Office of the Principal Legal Advisor, which is the largest legal program at DHS.
defaultPosition.title: Associate Legal Advisor, National Security Law Section

positions.description: Provide guidance on various aspects of immigration law, including national security, claims to U.S. citizenship, the role of human rights law in immigration law, and federal litigation. All with the Office of the Principal Legal Advisor, which is the largest legal program at DHS.
positions.title: Associate Legal Advisor, National Security Law Section
Special Advisor, Office of the Director

positions.description: Within the DHS Office of the General Counsel, provide guidance during complex litigation, at both district and appellate levels.
positions.title: Attorney Advisor, Office of the General Counsel

positions.description: Analyzed U.S. Government actions within the context of the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq, as well as other conflict-related activity.  Also met with members of Congress and their staffs regarding their policies on these issues.
positions.title: Acting Advocacy Director, International Justice and Human Rights

positions.description: Provided suggestions for the future development of PILPG, which provides legal assistance to states and governments engaged in negotiations, post-conflict constitution drafting, and war crimes prosecution.
positions.title: Advisory Council Member

positions.description: Performed legal research, analysis, and drafting, as well as developed PILPG's relationships with its institutional partners.
positions.title: Senior Peace Fellow

positions.description: Oversaw the work of three junior research associates as they conducted research and legal analysis, and drafted briefs and white papers for a number of PILPG's foreign government clients.
positions.title: Senior Research Associate

positions.description: Conducted research and legal analysis, and drafted briefs and white papers for a number of PILPG's foreign government clients.
positions.title: Research Associate

positions.description: Edited and fact checked articles and books to prepare them for publication.

positions.companyName: Hunt Alternatives Fund - Initiative for Inclusive Security
positions.description: Researched, wrote, and edited materials, including media and public relations materials, for the Initiative for Inclusive Security, which raises awareness about the roles women play in promoting domestic and international security.
